overview: Mika hasn't gotten over her breakup with Darling but the petite blonde has a new girlfriend now and has no intention of fucking her ex. Time for an all-out cat spat. When the fur flies, of course, the juices flow and soon these battling bitches are also using fingers, tongues and a lubed strap-on! Meanwhile, photographer Kitty convinces Darling's new gal Asia to pose for some nude pics, but when Darling crashes the party, a three-way battle royale breaks out! These hellcats go after each other with flailing fists and bared teeth... but it isn't too long before their probing tongues get involved, too. Three-dildo-fuckfest anyone?
title: When Asians Attack!
